summary: Iteration 50 - Light Blue Theme, Employee Marksheets, Admit Card Checkboxes. All features verified successfully. Dashboard has sky-500 gradient header (Light Blue theme like digitaledu.net). Employee Documents tab has 16 document types including 4 marksheets (10th, 12th, Graduation, PG). Admit Card Create Exam dialog uses checkbox selection for classes instead of text input. Student form has 9 tabs with Documents tab working correctly.

success_rate.backend: N/A (skipped per request - frontend only testing)

context_for_next_testing_agent: Light Blue theme (sky-500) implemented. Employee Documents has 16 document types with 4 marksheets. Admit Card uses checkbox class selection. All features working correctly.

dashboard_light_blue_theme.details: Dashboard header has 'bg-gradient-to-r from-sky-500 to-sky-600' - Light Blue theme like digitaledu.net

dashboard_white_stat_cards.details: 4 white stat cards with colored icons (sky-500, emerald-500, amber-500, violet-500)

dashboard_quick_actions_8_buttons.details: 8 Quick Action buttons: New Admission, Attendance, Fee Collection, Tino AI, Notices, AI Paper, SMS, ID Cards

dashboard_all_modules_12.details: 12 modules in All Modules grid: Students, Staff, Attendance, Fees, Exams, Library, Timetable, Transport, Visitor Pass, Gallery, Certificates, Reports

employee_documents_16_types.details: Employee Documents tab has 16 document types including 4 marksheets

admit_card_page_loads.details: Admit Card Management page loads correctly

admit_card_checkbox_class_selection.details: Create Exam dialog has 'Select Classes' section with checkbox selection (not text input). Shows 'No classes found. Add classes first.' when no classes exist.

student_form_9_tabs.details: Student form has exactly 9 tabs with emoji icons and Hindi translations

student_documents_tab.details: Student Documents tab shows Required Documents Checklist with 12 document types
